full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS SMAN GYI RGYAL PO LA GDUNG 'BOD GSOL 'DEBS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002B (ZHES BCOM LDAN 'DAS SMAN GYI RGYAL PO LA GDUNG 'BOD GSOL 'DEBS 'DI 'DRA ZHIG DGOS ZHES, BYA BTANG RI KHROD 'DZIN PA CHEN PO AA LAG MKHAS GRUB RGYA MTSOS BSKUL BA'I NGOR ^GSER TOG SKYES @003A *, ,MING SNGAGS 'CHANG RGAN PO BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSOS KA RING DGON PAR SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O,, ,,) TSUL 'DI KHAL HA SE CHEN RGYAL KHAG GI ,BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG CHEN PO T'A CANG JUN, ,SE CHEN PE'I LI TSE RING BSAM GRUB DANG, ,GA-YUNG DRUNG RDO RJE YID BZHIN 'KHOR LO BCAS, ,MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR TE DPAR DU BSGRUGS PA'I DGES, ,SKYE BA'I PHRENG BAR DAL 'BYOR TEN BZANG THOB, ,DRIN CAN BLA MA MCHOG DANG MI 'BRAL ZHING, ,SA LAM YON TAN YONGS SU MTHAR PHYIN SHOG , ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,
author_simple: BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO,
